body_html:
The weird part in all of this is that when you use Bazel on windows to build tensorflow libs, it keeps failing.
When you search for those errors you only find people telling you NOT to use bazel because there is no support on windows so far.
Then when we use Cmake you guys tell us to use bazel because you broke Cmake...

Then when we use Cmake you guys tell us to use bazel because you broke Cmake...
body:
The weird part in all of this is that when you use Bazel on windows to build tensorflow libs, it keeps failing.
When you search for  those errors you only find people telling you NOT to use bazel because there is no support on windows so far.
Then when we use Cmake you guys tell us to use bazel because you broke Cmake...
